nodes.text: Fereden was a Human female sergeant in the Imperial Reclamation Service of the Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the invasion of Belsavis, Fereden was part of the Imperial forces stationed at the Imperial Domination Outpost in the High Security Section of the planet Belsavis.
Sergeant Fereden appears as a Classic Gear Vendor for Imperial players on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
